title: WATCH: Slay queen Faith Nketsi drops trailer for reality show trailer and adds TV star to her resume
text:
WATCH: Slay queen Faith Nketsi drops trailer for reality show trailer and adds TV star to her resume share this

Cape Town - Local socialite Faith Nketsi also known as Queen Twerk, has bagged a reality show, giving viewers a look inside her personal life.

Faith dropped the trailer for Have Faith, which will air on MTV Africa, on Thursday, saying: "This has been the hardest secret to keep."

In the trailer for the show, Faith is visibly upset and in tears, when she experiences harsh words from a group of friends. She also introduces herself to the camera and takes viewers inside a gym session.

According to MTV Africa, this feat makes Faith the first woman in the country to have her own reality show on the channel.



"You can't tell who @faith.nketsi is just from a picture. So we're giving you #HaveFaith so you can see who Faith really is, [sic]" the channel shared.

Faith has over 1.3 followers on Instagram and garners thousands of likes with her racy photos.

The show will air in 43 different countries and will premiere on 28 October at 21:30 on MTV Africa (DStv 130).

Compiled by Graye Morkel
description: Local socialite Faith Nketsi also known as Queen Twerk, has bagged a reality show, giving viewers a look inside her personal life.
